issue.title: Allow stepping the simulator in paused state

content.raw:
> Unfortunately this sounds like a breaking change, because there could be users counting on the relationship between iterations and sim time.

I’m not sure if I got correctly what you meant, but calling `Server::IterationCount()` does not increase after _paused_ runs of the simulator \(as shown [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/issues/51/allow-stepping-the-simulator-in-paused#comment-56512370)\).
content.html:
Unfortunately this sounds like a breaking change, because there could be users counting on the relationship between iterations and sim time.

I’m not sure if I got correctly what you meant, but calling Server::IterationCount() does not increase after paused runs of the simulator (as shown here).
